io.github.austinv11.PluginDocumentation.API

Interface IBookData

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BookData

    public interface IBookData

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getAuthor()
      Gets the 'author' of the book, this is usually the name of the plugin that generated the BookData.
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> getContents()
      Gets the contents of the book.
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getLinks()
      If it has links, the links will be accessed through this method.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getPages()
      Creates and gets the pages in a book.
      java.lang.String getTitle()
      Gets the name of the book (either the plugin name or section name).
      java.lang.String getVersion()
      Gets the version of the book, in order to determine whether to reload the cached version.
      boolean hasLinks()
      If it has links, when the book is opened, it will send the player links.
      int numberOfChapters()
      Gets the number of chapters in the book.

    • Method Detail

      • hasLinks

        boolean hasLinks()
        If it has links, when the book is opened, it will send the player links.
        Returns:
        Whether the book has links.

      • getLinks

        java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getLinks()
        If it has links, the links will be accessed through this method.
        Returns:
        Hashmap with the links, formatted with .

      • getTitle

        java.lang.String getTitle()
        Gets the name of the book (either the plugin name or section name).
        Returns:
        The title.

      • getVersion

        java.lang.String getVersion()
        Gets the version of the book, in order to determine whether to reload the cached version.
        Returns:
        The version.

      • numberOfChapters

        int numberOfChapters()
        Gets the number of chapters in the book.
        Returns:
        Number of chapters.

      • getAuthor

        java.lang.String getAuthor()
        Gets the 'author' of the book, this is usually the name of the plugin that generated the BookData.
        Returns:
        Author name.

      • getContents

        java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> getContents()
        Gets the contents of the book.
        Returns:
        Hashmap with the contents of the chapters, formatted with .

      • getPages

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getPages()
        Creates and gets the pages in a book.
        Returns:
        String array with the pages.
